headline: 3 stock winners this portfolio manager anticipates for 2026
summary: Gradient Investments senior portfolio manager Keith Gangl shares some of his top stock picks he is predicting for 2026, like Amazon (AMZN), TJX Companies (TJX), and Cintas (CTAS). Also hear Keith Gangl address how geopolitical headlines and policy proposals are creating more "noise" for investors right now. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
